entry.title: WINTER STORM WATCH , Sarnia
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 06:59 AM EST Tuesday 21 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Mostly Cloudy, 0.3°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Sarnia Chris Hadfield Airport 4:00 PM EST Tuesday 21 February 2023
Condition: Mostly Cloudy
Temperature: 0.3°C
Pressure: 100.8 kPa
Visibility: 16.1 km
Humidity: 54 %
Dewpoint: -7.9°C
Wind: WNW 28 km/h gust 37 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: 3

entry.title: Tuesday night: Periods of light snow. Low minus 1. POP 60%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 60 percent chance of light snow overnight. Wind northwest 30 km/h becoming light early this evening. Wind becoming northeast 30 overnight. Low minus 1. Wind chill minus 8 overnight. Forecast issued 4:55 PM EST Tuesday 21 February 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Periods of light snow or ice pellets. High zero. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 60 percent chance of light snow in the morning and early in the afternoon. Ice pellets or freezing rain beginning early in the afternoon. Local ice pellet amount 2 cm. Wind east 30 km/h gusting to 50. High zero. Wind chill minus 8 in the morning. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 4:55 PM EST Tuesday 21 February 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Ice pellets mixed with freezing rain. Temperature steady near zero.
entry.summary: Ice pellets or freezing rain. Local ice pellet amount 5 cm. Wind east 30 km/h gusting to 50. Temperature steady near zero. Wind chill minus 8 in the evening. Forecast issued 4:55 PM EST Tuesday 21 February 2023
